'''2.3.407''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on September 10, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Better error messaging for users facing region mis-match in MSA vs XBL accounts.
* Various front & back end improvements & updates.
* Improvements to Bedrock Preview access flow.

== Fixes ==
* Fix to image error when offline.
* {{Bug|MCL-22248}} - "Get Game Pass!" button content is left-aligned, rather than center-aligned.
